title: FlipPro
author: FlipPro
created_time: August 18, 2023, 07:05:16 AMLast edit: August 18, 2023, 06:45:02 PM by FlipPro

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: FlipPro on August 18, 2023, 07:05:16 AMIn need of $1000 USDT (ERC-20) to be paid back within 30 days. Loan Amount: 1000 USDT (ERC-20)Loan Purpose: PersonalLoan Repay Amount: 1150 USDT (ERC-20)Loan Repay Date: On or before September 18thType of Collateral: N/AERC-20 - USDT address: 0xAA0842137E3ce3d7C4cfA5D6621FfD3D19c39171Including this one, you've made a total of 38 posts in the last 5 years.  You're last feedback was from nearly 7 years ago, and that was from an untrusted user.  Despite the age of your account, from a lender's perspective you are likely to be viewed as a high risk for an unsecured loan.  My suggestion is that you offer something as collateral, otherwise your request is unlikely to get filled.

comments.author: FlipPro
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on August 18, 2023, 02:07:39 PMQuote from: FlipPro on August 18, 2023, 07:05:16 AMIn need of $1000 USDT (ERC-20) to be paid back within 30 days. Loan Amount: 1000 USDT (ERC-20)Loan Purpose: PersonalLoan Repay Amount: 1150 USDT (ERC-20)Loan Repay Date: On or before September 18thType of Collateral: N/AERC-20 - USDT address: 0xAA0842137E3ce3d7C4cfA5D6621FfD3D19c39171Including this one, you've made a total of 38 posts in the last 5 years.  You're last feedback was from nearly 7 years ago, and that was from an untrusted user.  Despite the age of your account, from a lender's perspective you are likely to be viewed as a high risk for an unsecured loan.  My suggestion is that you offer something as collateral, otherwise your request is unlikely to get filled.I have been busy building. That’s why I don’t post as much anymore.I am public and have been around for a long time. My word is my bond and I will not lose my reputation in this forum over $1000.Otherwise, I don’t have much collateral to offer as all my altcoins are all very down.The lender will have to trust that I will do what I say.I hope this helps.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: FlipPro on August 18, 2023, 04:57:53 PMI am public and have been around for a long time.What am I missing, should I know who you are?Quote from: FlipPro on August 18, 2023, 04:57:53 PMMy word is my bond and I will not lose my reputation in this forum over $1000.That's good to hear, but a stranger's word doesn't put shoes on the kids' feet.Quote from: FlipPro on August 18, 2023, 04:57:53 PMOtherwise, I don’t have much collateral to offer as all my altcoins are all very down.Lol, I know.Quote from: FlipPro on August 18, 2023, 04:57:53 PMThe lender will have to trust that I will do what I say.I'm an active lender here, and I'm unconvinced.Quote from: FlipPro on August 18, 2023, 04:57:53 PMI hope this helps.I'm afraid it doesn't, but maybe signing a message from an old address will convince someone to trust you.  I wouldn't hold your breath if I were you, but it couldn't hurt your chances.Quote from: FlipPro on February 22, 2013, 12:57:39 PM~Bounty Address : 16aRu5cV8jRczZTYdpkYcmZC3zuXDYoXkF
